  • Field Details

    • refreshRate

      private int refreshRate
      This parameter sets how often the stock data is refreshed by accessing it.

    • runCount

      private int runCount
      This is the number of times that the loop is to execute, querying for data. It allows the user to set the number of thread executions to a given count. -1 indicates it should run until the thread is killed.

    • symbolsToTrack

      private ArrayList<StockQuoteAnalyzer> symbolsToTrack
      This is a listing of the symbols which are to be tracked.

    • audioPlayer

      private StockTickerAudioInterface audioPlayer
      This class represents the audioPlayer which is to be used to play error messages, happy messages, or other sounds based on the behavior of the market and the system.

    • out

      private PrintStream out
      This is the output stream to which the data is to be written.

  • Constructor Details

    • MarketAnalyzer

      public MarketAnalyzer(String[] symbols, StockQuoteGeneratorInterface wi, StockTickerAudioInterface audioPlayer)
      Parameters:
      symbols - This is an array of symbols that are to be watched by the stock ticker.
      wi - This is the stock quote generator that is to be used.
      audioPlayer - This is the audio player that is to be used to generate sounds when things happen.

  • Method Details

    • showErrorMessage

      public void showErrorMessage(String text)
      Display an error message and play the appropriate error sound(s).
      Parameters:
      text - This is the text of the error message that is to be printed.

    • updateData

      public void updateData()
      Update the data based on the current market conditions. This will obtain the most current data and print it out to the screen / console / printstream.
